tests.description: Game window created with correct title and dimensions

tests.name: Main Loop

tests.name: Event Handling

classes: Player - main character with power-up states
Enemy - Goomba entities with AI movement
Block - bricks, question blocks, and ground tiles
Barrier - destructible barrier requiring Super/Fire Mario

states: Small Mario (0) - dies on enemy contact

summary: The Vector Super Mario Bros Power Up Logic game successfully starts, initializes all game components, and runs stably for the 2-minute test period. All core systems are implemented including the power-up state machine, physics, collision detection, scoring, and level layout. The game responds to the ESC key for clean shutdown and exits gracefully with code 0.
